item.title: Takeaways from My Initial Exposure to Rust
item.description: My journey into learning Rust and getting into its wonderful open source community has been, on the whole, pretty stop-and-go. First Encounter I was introduced to Rust way back in 2014, probably around the time when it was around version 0.8 or so. I was a student in Hack Reactorâ€™s sixteenth cohort, learning JavaScript, Angular, and Node.js in preparation for taking on a role as a web developer.
